main.name: Aneesh Mullapudi
main.jobDescription: Full Stack Software Engineer, proficient in building production level systems using Python and React Js while having expertise in Devops and Databases
main.bio: I am an software engineer at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for building and deploying stuff, and a passion for coding. As a final year master student, I pursued my first development job to kick off my experience. I started actively contributing to an opensource project as a Database Lead, where I still contribute today. Since beginning my career there, I have been given the opportunity to work in all the realms of software engineering like development deployment and designing. I am currently working to integrate more features into the project.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

work.title: Database Lead
work.description1: Led a team of 3 in creating ERD diagram and database tables. Suggested to use PostgreSQL instead of MySQL which resulted in an increase of 30% in speed when used in dockerized environment.
work.description2: Built Docker container for API in order to improve developer workflow, increase and optimize performance.
work.description3: Helped in creating and maintaining an automated CI/CD pipeline for code deployment using Travis CI.
work.description4: Participated in Peer code reviews and provided suggestions on improving quality of the code.
work.description5: Partnered with web designers and assisted in breaking down the website into reusable React components and created a state machine diagram to provide hassle free development experience.
